Vanishing Execution:
On Powered Light Subclass Melle Kill
Gain Invisibility And Heal for X
(Longer, and Stronger effect on Finishers)
Invisibility Duration
• Minor = 6 seconds (10)
• Elite = 9 seconds (13)
• Miniboss = 12.5 seconds (13)
• Boss = 13 seconds
Finishers while in a Stasis Subclass will grant you the benefits from this Exotic.
Skittering Stinger:
Throwing Knife gains:
• Greatly increased tracking and a second bounce.
After 3 weapon precision hits within 2.5 seconds:
• Gain Strengthened Throwing Knife
Follow-up precision hits increase duration by 5 seconds each.
Strengthened Throwing Knife Grants:
• PvE 200% damage with throwing knife.
• PvP 100% damage with throwing knife.
• Strengthened Throwing knife staggers unstoppable champions.
Landing a throwing knife hit removes buff.
Parting Gift: Dodging drops a Parting Gift that explodes and deals 120 damage over 7.5 meters with a 1(?) second fuse timer.
Hawkeye Hack:
Only one shot per Golden Gun activation.
Grants 500% more damage to Golden Gun.
(37% more compared to Line 'Em Up x3)
Returns 33% of Super Energy on Kill.
Wraithmetal Mail:
On Dodge
Grants Wraithmetal Mail for 9 seconds.
Wraithmetal Mail:
• Reloads all weapons
• 100 Handling
• 100 Reload
• 50 Mobility
• Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%
• Increases Slide Distance by 33%
Relentless Tracker:
• Tracks enemies for 5 seconds after hovering reticle over them. Persists briefly through walls.
If enemy is below 30% HP:
• Grants 1% more damage per percent below 30%
(Eg: 10% HP left -> 20% damage increase)
Rapid Cooldown:
If sprinting:
• 100% Faster Grenade and Melee Recharge.
• Regenerates 3.5% Class Ability per Second.
On dodge:
• 6.25% faster sprint for 10 seconds. (Not refreshable)
Additive to Focused Breathing's 3% Class Ability per Second
Misdirection:
Dodging within 15 meters of an enemy applies Misdirection.
PvE Misdirection disorients minors as well as elites for 5 seconds.
PvP Misdirection warps audio and removes radar
for 5 seconds, as well as briefly blinding.
Misdirection also deals 1 damage on proc.
Vanishing Shadow:
Regenerates 4.4% of Melee Ability while invisible.
Increases duration of Invisibility effects.
Rat King: 6 -> 8 seconds (33% increase).
Vanish in Smoke: 7 > 9 seconds (29% increase).
Vanishing Step: 5 -> 6 seconds (20% increase).
Flawless Execution: 9 -> 12 seconds (33% increase)
Roving Assassin:
During Spectral Blades:
• Restores Super Energy % on Heavy Attack based on the amount of Spectral Blade Kills.
Super Energy % gains based on kills:
• PvE 11.1 -> 14.3 -> 16.5 -> 16.9 -> 17.1
• PvP 8.3 -> 12.5 -> 14.2 -> 15.8 -> 16.7
Touch of Venom:
Punching someone with full melee energy will instantly cast Smoke Bomb.
• Smoke Bombs deal 2.5x more damage.
• Standing in the smoke bomb's cloud grants Truesight for 3(?) seconds, allowing you to see enemy outlines through walls from up to 64 meters away.
Upgraded Sensor Pack:
Radar remains active while Aiming Down Sights.
If crouched:
• Enhanced radar. (12 sectors instead of 6).
Cross Counter:
If on Arc subclass:
Receiving Melee Damage or using Melee:
• Grants Cross Counter for 3 seconds or until hit.
Cross Counter:
• Grants 3x increased melee damage.
One-Two Punch's bonus is reduced to 80% if Cross Counter is active.
Illegally Modded Holster: Precision hits load one round to the chamber of stowed Hand Cannons. Hand Cannons ready faster and are more accurate immediately after swapping to them.
Probability Matrix:
25% chance per enemy hit with Arcbolt Grenade to recharge your Grenade.
Arcbolt Grenades chain up to 5 times (from 4)
Light Shift:
Stais Sublcass Only -> Replaces Dodge with Shift
Shift has a distance of 10 meters, and renders you completely invisible except for a trail for the duration of the shift.
Dodging grants Light Shift buff for 10 seconds.
• PvE Light Shift increases damage to Slowed/Frozen targets by 10%
• PvE 10% more damage to Arc Weapons.
Dodge does not recharge while Light Shift buff is active.
Spring-Loaded Mounting:
Readying sidearm on critical health:
• PvE 100% Damage increase until no longer critical.
• PvP 35% Damage increase until no longer critical.
• Refreshes sidearm magazine.
(Generates ammo if reserves are empty).
• 100 Handling to Sidearm Stow and Ready speed.
Adamantine Brace: Bows charges can be held indefinitely.
Beyond The Veil:
• Grants an extra Smoke Bomb Charge.
• 50% Melee Energy per ally Cloaked.
When you make an ally invisible, they gain:
• PvE 50% Damage Resistance.
• PvP 10% Damage Resistance.
Scissor Fingers:
• Grants an additional Melee Charge
Then on Solar Subclasses.
Melee Charges are recharged simultaneously.
(Eg: Both are recharged on dodge)
Uncanny Arrows: Provides ability energy for each enemy tethered by Deadfall anchors. Moebius Quiver has more shots.
Synapse Junctions: Quick successive attacks with Arc Staff increase its damage output and duration.
Mobius Conduit:
Blocking with Whirlwind Guard doesn't consume extra Super Energy.
Can deactivate Arc Staff at any time to preserve a portion of unspent Super Energy.
Nightmare Fuel:
Dealing melee damage reloads your currently equipped weapon.
7 second cooldown.
Sharp Edges: Hits and kills with Blade Barrage will return Super energy after the Super ends.
New Tricks:
If on Skip Grenades.
Grants an extra Grenade Charge.
Skip Grenades spawn 1 more drone (4 -> 5) and chase enemies much more aggressively.
Hits with Skip Grenades grant X% Grenade Energy.
Hydraulic Boosters:
Increased Jump Height Increase:
High Jump = 9 meters -> 12 meters
Strafe Jump = 8 meters -> 9 meters
Triple Jump = 6 meters -> 7 meters for First Jump
9 meters -> 11 meters for Second Jump
Jump Distance Increase:
(Includes innate 6.25% faster sprint)
High Jump = 28 meters -> 33 meters
Strafe Jump = 26 meters -> 31 meters
Triple Jump = 31 meters -> 38 meters.
Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%
Increases Slide Distance by 33%
Wish-Dragon Teeth:
Grants enhanced Tripmine Grenades.
Enhanced Tripmine Grenades:
14% more damage
X% bigger radius
Lasts 20 seconds longer (10 -> 30)
And have X HP (Normally Y)
Ability Damage recharges 33% of Grenade Ability.
Fury Conductors:
Melee Hits grant stacks of Fury Conductors.
Receiving melee damage unleashes an Arc Explosion with a radius of 5 meters.
Arc Explosion deals 22% of your Melee Damage per stack of Fury Conductors.
Fury Conductors grants 33-55-70% damage resistance to melee depending on number of stacks.
All stacks disappear upon receiving melee damage or after 10 seconds of not Meleeing.
Auto-Loading Link: Refreshes 10% of Readied Auto Rifle/Machine Gun magazine every 1.5 seconds.
Transfusion Matrix:
Arc Melee Kills fully recharge Melee Ability and begins Health Regeneration.
Knockout counts as Arc Melee Kill.
Reflective Vents:
During slide after sprinting for at least 1.5 seconds:
• Generate a 180° frontal shield that reflects damage and projectiles.
• Increases Slide Distance by 33%.
And Another Thing:
Grants an extra Grenade Charge.
Does not stack with Top Tree Striker.
Bring the Heat:
Fusion Grenades now explode on impact and gain increased throw speed.
Kills with Fusion Grenades grant Grenade Energy.
• 25% for Minors
• 50% for Majors
• 100% for Guardians & Bosses.
Assault Barricade:
Alters Towering Barricade
Assault Barricade has halved health and duration, but enables you and your allies to shoot through it.
Barricade:
• 600HP -> 300HP
• 20 seconds -> 10 seconds.
Survival Well: Generates an additional Orb of Power from Supers and a healing pulse when Barricade is activated.
Glorious Charge:
Thundercrash deals 2x more damage.
On Thundercrash Deactivation:
• Gain an 100HP Overshield for 7 seconds.
Overshield Duration scales with Thundercrash distance, up to a max of 20 seconds.
Horns of Doom:
Powered Void Melee kills grant 20% Super Energy
Sentinel Shield's Shield Throws regenerate 10% Super Energy.
Linear Actuators:
After sprinting for 1.5s, gain Linear Actuators for 7 seconds.
Linear Actuators applies Shocked for 2 seconds on enemy, which releases an Arc static charge that chains when another enemy is within 20 meters. Shocked is refreshed on chain.
• PvE 4x(?) Melee Damage
• PvP 85 Damage.
• Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%
• Increases Slide Distance by 33%.
Resolute:
Casting Fists of Havoc grants Resolute.
Resolute is a 75HP Overshield that negates Precision Damage.
Overshield can be refreshed by unequipping and equipping.
Sunfire Furnace:
If on Solar Subclass:
0.9% Melee & Grenade Ability Recharge per Second.
If Solar Super is Charged.
4.25% Melee & Grenade Ability Recharge per Second.
Overflowing Light:
On Ability Usage: Gain Empowered.
While Empowered:
• 30% more Ability Damage per stack.
• 40% Barricade Health per stack.
• 5% Melee and Grenade Energy per Second.
• 4% Barricade Energy per Second.
Unpowered melees also proc Empowered.
Double stacks are complicated, they can only work in specific orders (Eg: Barricade -> Melee).
Starless Night:
Guarding with Sentinel / Banner Shield blinds enemies within 7 meters for 5 seconds.
Any Ward of Dawn that you create grants Starless Night, which gives a 65HP Overshield to any ally that enters.
Overshield persists for up to 6 seconds.
Enemies that enter your Ward of Dawn are also blinded for 5 seconds.
Glacial Guard:
Replaces Barricade with Glacial Guard.
On Glacial Guard activation:
• Grants Shielded buff for 20 seconds
• Applies 40 slow stacks to enemies within 7 meters
Shielded buff:
• Grants 100HP overshield
• prevents: sprinting, double jumping, and sliding
Solar Rampart:
Summoning Barricade unleashes a Solar Wave that returns back to the barricade after 18.5 meters.
PvP Deals 100 damage.
Solar Kills refresh 25% of Class Ability Energy.
Jump Jets:
No In-Air Accuracy Penalty when Hipfiring in Lift.
Enables hipfire while in Lift.
Increases Lift Duration to 4 seconds.
Lift Duration in seconds:
High Lift: 2.6 -> 4
Stafe Lift: 2.2 -> 4
Catapult Lift: 1 -> 4

Vengeance:
Receiveing damage highlights the enemy that caused it for 8 seconds.
Killing the targeted enemy grants Vengeance for 6 seconds.

Sun Warrior buff from Sunspots lasts twice as long
(5 ->10 seconds)

Sun Warrior:
• 2.8x faster Grenade Recharge
• 4.2x Melee Ability Recharge

Kintsugi:
Reviving / Getting Revived procs Kintsugi.
Kintsugi:
Grants you and allies within 15 meters

Leaving 15 meter radius removes Overshield

Powered Melee Finisher

Clenched Fist:
Maxes out Sword's Guard Resistance, Efficiency, and Endurance.
Perfectly timed blocks heal for 80(?) HP.
Blocking properties with Stronghold:
• Aggressive Frame Swords obtain 95% Damage Resistance.
• Any other sword obtains 90% Damage Resistance.
• Sword Energy does not decay from blocking damage or holding guard.
Biotic Enhancements:
When Surrounded by 2 in PvE 3 in PvP enemies:
Activates Biotic Enhancements.
Biotic Enhancements increases Melee and Super damage for 8 seconds.
1.5x Super Damage
PvE 3x Melee Damage.
PvP 2x Melee Damage.

Ursine Guard:
Move at 90% your normal forward speed while blocking with Sentinel Shield.
Converts damage into Super Energy after Super ends, up to 75%.
Overshields and healing prevent damage into Super Energy conversion.

Burning Fists:
Grants Burning Fists on Melee Kill.

Fully restores Health, Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy on Super Cast.

Explode enemys in an elemental explosion with a radius of X meters, of your currently selected Light Subclass.

Chaotic Exchanger:
On Grenade Charge: Grants Chaotic Exchanger.
Chaotic Exchanger grants 20% Damage Resist.
Grenade Hits return between 15% to 85% Grenade Energy.
4 second cooldown between proc.
Charged Vortex Grenade can proc twice if enemies get hit by the initial explosion and the last few ticks.
Conduction Tines:
Arc Abilility Kills grant Conduction Tines for 7 seconds. Stacks up to 3x.
Conduction Tines grant various bonuses.
At x1 Conduction Tines
• 1.5% Grenade and Melee Ability per Second
• 0.45% Super Ability per Second.
At x2 Conduction Tines
• 4% Grenade and Melee Ability per Second.
At x3 Conduction Tines
• 6.3% Grenade and Melee Ability
• 1.7% Super Ability per Second
• 66% Slower Super Drain.
Super Drain does not affect Chaos Reach, but affects every other Super.
Rites of Ember:
Burns last X seconds longer and grant X% Melee Energy on Solar Burn DoT
Daybreak applies burning.
Solar Burns add Rites of Ember debuff, which amplify the damage dealt by Daybreak.
Only Daybreak projectiles, Igniting Touch, and Phoenix Dive work.
Stacks Top Bottom
1-4 1.45x 1.35x
5-6 2.1x 1.95x
7+ 3.05x 2.83x
Cerebral Uplink:
Highlights enemies below 33% HP in a red outline, and enemy guardians with Supers Readied in a yellow outline.
Passively regenerates 0.6% of Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy per second.
(Stasis Grenades recharge at .45% Ability Energy per Second.)
Warlord's End:
Arc, Solar, and Void Melee Kills, as well as Finishers weaken (1.3x Debuff) and blind.
Finishers add 5 Seconds to Duration.

Close Enough:
Chaos Reach recovers 10% Super Charge on hit. 0.75s Cooldown.
Effectively maxes out duration by 2 times.
Sprinting while above 80% Super Energy grants Topping off Chaos Reach.
Topping off Chaos Reach charges 4% of Super Energy per second.
Dynamic Duo:
Holding Grenade Ability spawns a Sentient Arc Soul for 20 seconds.
Sentient Arc Soul shoots a longer burst of 5 bolts.
If the Sentient Arc Soul hits during a burst, gain X% Grenade Energy.
Standing in an Arc Soul Rift refreshes the duration of Sentient Arc Soul.
Vampire's Caress:
On Melee Kill:
Heal for X HP and constantly regenerate X HP/s.
Lasts for 8.5 seconds. Can be Refreshed.
Alchemical Etchings:
While inside a Rift or Well of Radiance:
100 Reload with 0.9x Duration Scale to everyone inside.
While inside an Empowering Rift or Well of Radiance:
2.25x Range Increase.
This is a multiplier to effective range. Affects every weapon.
Absorption Cells -----------------------: Not acurate data using bngies description
Absorption Cells: Takedowns with weapons that have a damage type matching your subclass element grant you Super energy. While your Super energy is full, you instead gain a temporary bonus to weapon damage of the type matching your subclass element.
Grasp of the Devourer:
Melee hit applies poison.
Poison deals up to 7.8x the total damage of Melee Damage.
Bosses take an additional 1.8x damage.
Initial Poison tick deals 18% of Melee damage, while the last tick deals 1.54x.
Each successive Poison tick deals 9% more damage. 19 ticks.
Poisoned enemies spread the poison on death on a 3 meter radius.
Thorn final blows (by bullet) spreads poison.
PvP values unknown.
Abyssal Extractors:
Void Kills grant Abyssal Extractors for 2.5 seconds.
Maxes out at 20 seconds.
[PVP] Getting a double kill within 2.5 seconds maxes duration to 20 seconds.
While Abyssal Extractor is active:
2.35% Rift Recharge per second
3.65% Grenade and Melee Recharge per second
0.67% Super Recharge per second.
Cobra Totemic:
Grants +32 Reload and Handling to all weapons.
+1 Meter Lunge range (6.25 -> 7.25)

Battle-Hearth:
Kills while inside a Well of Radiance return Super Energy, up to 75%.
10% Super Energy per Kill, each kill grants 1.5% less from the previous.
Minimum of 4% Super Energy.
10% -> 8.5% -> 6% -> 4.5% -> 4% -> 4%...
Embers of Light:
Dawnblade Kills spawn both an Empowering and Healing Rift on Enemy Death Location.
Legs glow as your super gets charged.
Blood Magic:
Weapon Kills while inside an Empowering or Healing Rift grant Blood Magic
Blood Magic halts the duration of the Rift.
Blood Magic Duration:
5 seconds of per Kill. Caps at 15 seconds.
Actual Grandeur: Provides additional damage resistance during Nova Bomb. Nova Bomb kills grant Super energy.
Fusion Harness:
If on Fusion Grenades.
Gain an extra Grenade Charge.
20% Grenade Energy per Weapon Damage Instance while Empowered (0.5s Cooldown).
100% Rift Energy on Grenade Kill.

Ascending Amplitude increases Stormtrance damage.
Ascending Amplitude damage increase.

Solar Grenades possess built-in Fastball and last twice as long.

grants 'Tome of Dawn'.
